page.title: 04Transport
page.content: We visited{Allington Garage}for part of our{Domesday Project}.We talked to {Mr Smith }the owner of the garage. He works for about 82 hours a week. He has got 7 staff on the job .To work in his garage you would need about 3 to 5 years training. Last year he had 1 tanker every 8 days.{Mr Smith}is very friendly. This is the only garage in this block .{Sarah}and{Sharon} sat in {Allington} and counted the cars that went past us.We saw 182 cars,15 bikes, 2 lorries,2 buses and no aeroplanes. We sat watching cars go by for about half an hour. We also did a traffic survey in {Newton Tony.}We did not see very many vehicles . We saw 23 cars ,no buses,10 lorries,1 moter bike and 2 aeroplanes. We stayed there for about half an hour .{Allington}and {Boscombe}have a lot of traffic,{Newton {Tony}does not have much.
